casebody.data:
In Re: Todd W. Short 46P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. July 5, 2016 Mr. Todd Short, Pro Se.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 30th of June 2016 by Petitioner for Stay of Orders Entered by the NC Court of Appeals:

"Motion Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of July 2016."
